title: What are your five rules
excerpt: One way to think about how to achieve success in any endeavor is to think about it in terms of following the most straightforward path.

children.text: One way to think about how to achieve success in any endeavor is to think about it in terms of following the most straightforward path.
What’s going to get me from point A to point B in the fastest most efficient way possible?
If you can pin-point exactly what you need to do to get to where you want to be, where all you have to do is follow a linear path, then, it’s a lot easier to figure out how to get there.
Because then the hardest part isn’t determining what you should be doing, it’s merely figuring out what’s holding you back from consistently following the rules that make success possible.
If it were as simple as following five simple rules, would you do it?
